title: Trump Just Revealed Who The Mole Was And America Was Shocked To The Core!
text: Trump Just Revealed Who the Mole Was and America Was Shocked to the Core! Sunday, January 15, 2017 22:10 % of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents. By Lisa Haven In an effort to rule out the likelihood that members of his own administration might be sharing classified information with the public, President-elect, Donald Trump, conducted a sting operation. Last Wednesday, Trump stated that he had set a trap in order to discover who was behind all those leaks, and to his surprise, it was someone closer than heâ€™d like to realize.
